values: This is a final post to let people know where on the web they can find me. This journal ran its course and became not much more than a mirror for my flickr account and I have far too many things I struggle to keep up with. I will keep the account so that I can read my friends' journals and comment non-anonymously. I can be found in these places: Tuesday Meeting Doodles - where I continue something I started here - posting my doodles from my weekly staff meeting at work. I moved all the ones from here over to there and have started posting new ones and old ones that hadn't made it here yet. Dan Machold Photo - my very out of date photo website which I hope to turn into more of a blog format soon so I can update it more easily. ShowlistAustin - still going, still growing. Flickr - where I post anything and everything photo-wise, whether it be good or experimental or my cat. Twitter - where I post only about music - short record reviews and reports from and about shows I go to. Facebook - yeah, you know what facebook is. And after five years, I still play Kingdom of Loathing every day. See? I told you I have too much to keep up with! -Dan
